mapper.insert: insert into Product (pno, title, link, image, lprice, hprice, mallName, productId, productType, maker, brand, category1, category2, category3, category4, scoreAvg) values(0, #{title}, #{link}, #{image}, #{lprice}, #{hprice}, #{mallName}, #{productId}, #{productType}, #{maker}, #{brand}, #{category1}, #{category2}, #{category3}, #{category4}, #{scoreAvg})
insert into ProductReply (rNo, mNo, pNo, content, score, createDate) values (0, #{mno}, #{pno}, #{content}, #{score}, default)
mapper.update: UPDATE product set scoreAVG = (SELECT AVG(score) FROM ProductReply where pno = #{pno}) where pNo = #{pno}
mapper.insert: insert into CART (mno, pno, amount) values (#{mno}, #{pno}, #{amount})
mapper.update: UPDATE CART set amount = #{amount} where mno = #{mno} and pno = #{pno}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Cart INNER JOIN Product ON Cart.pNo = Product.pNo INNER JOIN Member ON Cart.mNo = Member.mNo where Member.mno = #{mno};
